Splits a string by commas, skipping over parenthesis sections

Source: R/Utility.R
nested_split.Rd

nested_split splits by comma, keeps parenthesis sections together

Usage

nested_split(total_string)

Arguments

total_string

the complete string to split

Value

returns a vector of substrings

See also

Other Data Cleaning Functions: Check_Dupe_Columns(), Check_Trunc(), Check_Verbose(), Date_Shift(), Def_Control(), Def_model_control(), Event_Count_Gen(), Event_Time_Gen(), Joint_Multiple_Events(), Replace_Missing(), Time_Since(), factorize(), gen_time_dep(), interact_them(), parse_literal_string()
